TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit VisualStyleElement/ExplorerBar/NormalGroupHead extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Provides a for the title bar of a common group of items in the Explorer Bar. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ExplorerBar.NormalGroupHead.Normal%2A> property of the VisualStyleElement.ExplorerBar.NormalGroupHead class gets a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> that represents the title bar of a common group of items in the Explorer Bar, such as the **File and Folder Tasks** group in Windows Explorer.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ExplorerBar.NormalGroupHead.Normal%2A> property. To run this example, paste it into a Windows Form. Handle the form’s <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and call the `DrawVisualStyleElementExplorerBarNormalGroupHead1` method from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event-handling method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
[!code-cs[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#157](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/5c28e55a-75a5-4850-b511-_1.cs)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#157](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/5c28e55a-75a5-4850-b511-_1.vb)]

Docs.summary: Gets a visual style element that represents the title bar of a common group of items in the Explorer Bar.
Docs.value: A that represents the title bar of a common group of items in the Explorer Bar.

remarks.format:
## Remarks You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the Normal property to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the Normal property. To run this example, paste it into a Windows Form. Handle the form’s <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and call the `DrawVisualStyleElementExplorerBarNormalGroupHead1` method from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event-handling method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
[!code-cs[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#157](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/8a674422-a925-4512-8649-_1.cs)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#157](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/8a674422-a925-4512-8649-_1.vb)]
